statements: SELECT * FROM risk_management_system
SELECT financial_instrument, exposure FROM risk_management_system
SELECT id, financial_instrument, risk_factor FROM risk_management_system ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM risk_management_system WHERE exposure > 100
SELECT financial_instrument, risk_factor FROM risk_management_system WHERE risk_factor < 0.5
SELECT id, financial_instrument, exposure, risk_factor FROM risk_management_system WHERE exposure > 100 ORDER BY financial_instrument ASC;
SELECT financial_instrument, SUM(exposure) AS total_exposure FROM risk_management_system GROUP BY financial_instrument HAVING total_exposure > 50000;
SELECT financial_instrument, risk_factor, exposure FROM risk_management_system WHERE risk_factor BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1 ORDER BY risk_factor DESC;
SELECT id, financial_instrument, exposure * risk_factor AS risk_value FROM risk_management_system WHERE financial_instrument LIKE 'IBM%' ORDER BY risk_value DESC;
SELECT financial_instrument, AVG(exposure) AS avg_exposure FROM risk_management_system GROUP BY financial_instrument HAVING avg_exposure < 5000;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments
SELECT instrument_name, exposure_limit FROM financial_instruments
SELECT exposure_id, exposure_value, date_recorded FROM exposures WHERE exposure_value > 1000
SELECT instrument_name FROM financial_instruments WHERE exposure_limit < 5000 ORDER BY instrument_name ASC
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments WHERE instrument_id = 3
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments WHERE instrument_name = 'Stocks';
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, exposure_limit FROM financial_instruments ORDER BY exposure_limit DESC;

SELECT financial_instruments.instrument_name, exposures.exposure_value, exposures.date_recorded FROM financial_instruments JOIN exposures ON financial_instruments.instrument_id = exposures.instrument_id WHERE exposure_value > 10000;
SELECT instrument_name AS 'Instrument Name', exposure_limit AS 'Exposure Limit' FROM financial_instruments WHERE exposure_limit BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY instrument_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments LEFT JOIN exposures ON financial_instruments.instrument_id = exposures.instrument_id WHERE exposure_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY instrument_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name FROM financial_instruments;
SELECT instrument_name, exposure FROM financial_instruments WHERE instrument_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM exposure_monitoring WHERE factor_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, SUM(exposure_amount) AS total_exposure FROM exposure_monitoring GROUP BY instrument_id;
SELECT instrument_name, exposure FROM financial_instruments ORDER BY exposure DESC, instrument_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments WHERE exposure > 10000 ORDER BY instrument_name ASC

SELECT instrument_name, factor_name, exposure_amount FROM financial_instruments JOIN exposure_monitoring ON financial_instruments.instrument_id = exposure_monitoring.instrument_id JOIN risk_factors ON exposure_monitoring.factor_id = risk_factors.factor_id WHERE exposure_amount > 5000 ORDER BY factor_weight DESC, exposure_amount ASC
SELECT DISTINCT instrument_name FROM financial_instruments

SELECT factor_name, SUM(exposure_amount) AS total_exposure FROM risk_factors JOIN exposure_monitoring ON risk_factors.factor_id = exposure_monitoring.factor_id GROUP BY factor_name HAVING total_exposure > 10000 ORDER BY total_exposure DESC
SELECT * FROM risk_management;
SELECT instrument_name, exposure_amount FROM risk_management WHERE risk_factor > 0.5;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_exposure FROM portfolios ORDER BY total_exposure DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, risk_category FROM financial_instruments WHERE instrument_type = 'Stock';
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM risk_categories;
SELECT instrument_name, exposure_amount FROM risk_management ORDER BY exposure_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM portfolios WHERE total_exposure > 10000;
SELECT instrument_name, risk_category FROM financial_instruments WHERE instrument_type = 'Stock';
SELECT * FROM risk_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT portfolio_name, total_exposure FROM portfolios WHERE owner = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments;
SELECT name, instrument_type FROM financial_instruments ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT category_name, COUNT(instrument_id) AS total_instruments FROM instruments_categories INNER JOIN instrument_relationships ON instruments_categories.category_id = instrument_relationships.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT * FROM instrument_values WHERE value_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT instrument_id, exposure_amount FROM risk_exposure WHERE exposure_amount > 1000 ORDER BY exposure_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments;
SELECT id, name, instrument_type FROM financial_instruments WHERE exposure_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM instruments_categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'Equity%';
SELECT value_date, instrument_value FROM instrument_values WHERE instrument_id = 3 ORDER BY value_date DESC;

SELECT financial_instruments.name, instrument_relationships.category_id, instrument_values.instrument_value FROM financial_instruments INNER JOIN instrument_relationships ON financial_instruments.id = instrument_relationships.instrument_id INNER JOIN instrument_values ON financial_instruments.id = instrument_values.instrument_id WHERE instrument_values.value_date = '2023-01-15';
